躃字的基本解释

躃
bì
古同“躄”。

躃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》房益切，入昔，並。］
亦作“躄1”。
(1)足不能行。
(2)仆倒。
(3)方言。蹑手蹑脚地行走。
(4)用同“擗”。捶胸。参见“躃踊”。

躃字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　躃； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1234第27
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?必益切，音辟。?，或从足作躃。人不能行也。【禮·王制】瘖聾跛躃。【釋文】兩足不能行也。　又【集韻】毗亦切，音擗。倒也。【類篇】仆也。

躃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
躃字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yin
bì
Ancient Tong "躄".
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guangyun" Fang Yiqie, into the past, merge. ]
Also known as "躄1".
(1) Not enough.
(2) Falling down.
(3) Dialects. Walking tiptoe.
(4) Use the same as "擗". Beat your chest. See "躃踊".
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Foot Character Department】　躃; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1234 Page 27
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Must benefit cutting, sound development. ?, or from the foot. People can't do it either. [Rite · King System] Deaf and lame. [Explanation] Two feet can't do it.　[Jiyun] Pi also cut, sound. It's true. 【Classes】Servants too.
